linux.command: git fetch --prune && git fetch -p ; git branch -r | awk '{print $1}' | egrep -v -f /dev/fd/0 <(git branch -vv | grep origin) | awk '{print $1}' | xargs git branch -D

windows.command: git fetch --prune; git branch -vv | ?{$_ -match 'origin/' -and -not (git branch -r | %{"$_"})} | %{$_.Split()[0]} | % { git branch -D $_ }
